name: Kara
params: x: Number - The x position to initialize the kara
y: Number - The y position to initialize the kara
args: Object - { direction: Number, zIndex: Number }

name: move
desc: Move kara in the current direction for one grid.
throws: GameLogicError - ex. try to move out of bound, walk into trees, push two mashrooms at once, etc.

name: putLeaf
desc: Put leaf on the current grid where kara stands
throws: GameLogicError - ex. there is already a leaf on the current grid

name: takeLeaf
desc: Take leaf from the current grid where kara stands
throws: GameLogicError - ex. there is no leaf on the current grid

name: onLeaf
desc: Indicates whether kara is on a leaf or not
return: Boolean - if kara is on leaf, return true

name: treeFront
desc: Indicates whether there is a tree in front of kara
return: Boolean - if a tree is in front of kara, return true

name: treeLeft
desc: Indicates whether there is a tree on the left side of kara
return: Boolean - if a tree is on the left side of kara, return true

name: treeRight
desc: Indicates whether there is a tree on the right side of kara
return: Boolean - if a tree is on the right side of kara, return true

name: mashroomFront
desc: Indicates whether there is a mashroom in front of kara
return: Boolean - if a mashroom is in front of kara, return true
